## Growth

```{python}
fed_budget_2002 = 2370000000000
fed_budget_2012 = 3380000000000
fed_budget_2012 / fed_budget_2002
```

```{python}
fed_budget_2002 = 2.37
fed_budget_2012 = 3.38
fed_budget_2012 / fed_budget_2002
```

```{python}
g = (fed_budget_2012 / fed_budget_2002) ** (1/10) - 1
g
```

```{python}
(1 + g) ** 10 * fed_budget_2002
```
